'That... Can't be...'%K%P
'I'm hearing things, right?\nThere's no way Sara could be retiring, right?'%K%P
'Yamato! Say something!'%K%P
Shuri pleaded, hoping for some words of comfort.%K%P
But I didn't have any to offer.%K%P
'No... How can she do this...?'%K%P
Shuri collapsed where she stood.%K%P
Hers wasn't the only strong reaction, either.%K%P
The Divine Idol fans who came to see the results\nwere showing their shock in all kinds of ways.\nSome shouted, broke down crying, or froze in place.%K%P
'Everyone, please remain calm and let us offer an\nexplanation for Ms. Benzaiten's announcement.'%K%P
The staff were hurrying to\nget the place under control.%K%P
'L☆SEVEN was originally conceived as a Divine Idol\ngroup based on the Seven Goddesses of Good Luck.\nAnd so we all take the number seven very seriously.'%K%P
'Ms. Benzaiten's retirement was planned\nfrom the very start. This audition was organized\nas a way to elect her replacement.'%K%P
Eight Goddesses of Good Luck wouldn't make any\nsense if there are supposed to be seven.%K%P
The official opinion had been that eight\nwould be fine, but apparently that was all part of\nthe plan to keep Sara's retirement under wraps.%K%P
On an emotional level it was hard to accept,\nbut the situation was understandable.%K%P
However, they never explained the reason behind\nSara's retirement, and just went on to announce\nthe results of the qualifier voting.%K%P
'Hey, cheer up now! We made it through the qualifier,\ndidn't we? That's something to celebrate, isn't it?\nCome on, hip hip hooray, right?'%K%P
Kagura tried to cheer the unhappy Shuri up.%K%P
But Shuri remained silent.%K%P
'Kagura, you seem okay, huh?'%K%P
'Hmmm... Well, I was shocked too, of course.\nBut seeing Shuri like this...'%K%P
Strangely, seeing her friend so upset\nkept her from collapsing herself.%K%P
'Anyway, can you take care of Shuri now?\nI've got to get to my part-time job.'%K%P
'No problem. Leave it to me,\nyou head to work.'%K%P
'Oh, and Kagura...\nCongratulations on making it through the qualifier!'%K%P
'Thank you! Okay then, see you later!'%K%P
'Here, have some tea.'%K%P
'...Thanks.'%K%P
I brought Shuri back to my place\nto get away from everything.%K%P
'Sara said she'd come by this evening.'%K%P
I'd got in touch with her on the way here.%K%P
I figured it'd be good for both of us to\nhear about things directly from the source.%K%P
I'd asked Kagura to come by once Sara was here,\nbut she was apparently on night shift and said no.%K%P
Shuri and I would hear Sara out at her place,\nand fill Kagura in later.%K%P
It was around 9pm when Sara let me know that\nshe was on her over.%K%P
Clearly, things were tough on all sides.%K%P
Talk of Sara retiring was already all over the net.%K%P
'Sooo...'%K%P
'I'm sorry, it looks like I really\ntook you all by surprise huh.'%K%P
Sara was smiling self-consciously.%K%P
'Can I ask why you decided to retire?'%K%P
'Well, it's not something I could discuss in public,\nbut I guess you had a hard time accepting it all.'%K%P
'Honestly, I'm quitting because of private reasons.\nI have a personal problem that stops me\nfrom continuing to be a Divine Idol.'%K%P
'It's kind of embarrassing,\nso I'd appreciate it if you didn't ask for details.'%K%P
'Private reasons, huh...'%K%P
'There's no weird conspiracy or\nmysterious blackmail or anything, so relax.'%K%P
'Actually, your sister is really worried too.\nShe asked if I've been influenced by\n'the powers of darkness'...'%K%P
'That's my sister...'%K%P
'The powers of darkness'... Quite the imagination.%K%P
However, without any real explanation,\nit's only natural to suspect that some kind of\noutside force was pushing her to retire.%K%P
'I'm sad to be stop being a Divine Idol,\nbut I don't plan on giving up being me.'%K%P
'So please, don't worry so much about it.\nYou two still have the audition ahead of you,\nyou can't let this distract you!'%K%P
'Understood. Now that you've explained things,\nall that's left is to focus on the audition.'%K%P
'Right, give it your all. I'm pulling for you!'%K%P
'When I leave, a new goddess will fill my place.'%K%P
'L☆SEVEN will gain a new flavor.\nWhat flavor can you show us?'%K%P
'If you think you're worthy of filling my place\nin L☆SEVEN, show us your absolute best!'%K%P
'I'm expecting a lot from you, Shuri.'%K%P
Sara gave Shuri a harsh pep-talk and left.%K%P
'Oh wow... I could be Sara's replacement...'%K%P
Becoming the eighth goddess in L☆SEVEN\nhad taken on a different meaning.%K%P
Passing the audition and becoming the new member\nnow meant carrying the heavy responsibility of\nfilling Sara's shoes.%K%P
'What am I going to do... There's no way I...'%K%P
Having come this far, she knew just how good\nL☆SEVEN was. They were on a totally\ndifferent level from Love☆Kami.%K%P
Despite her inexperience, she would be\nreplacing Sara, and thus always compared to her.%K%P
[It's Shuri.\nI hope you're doing okay, sis.]%K%P
[I bet you were surprised\nto see I'm taking part in the audition.]%K%P
[I was really shocked to hear about Sara,\nbut I'll do my best in the audition!]%K%P
[I really hope I can pass and\ntake the stage to sing next to you.]%K%P
[Maybe we can meet up on your next day off?\nThere's a lot I'd like to talk about.]%K%P
[Answer soon.\nLove you, sis!]%K%P
